tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I was 5 month pregent i got to no my baby had a problem few doctors said they cant take chance it was Dr vidaymani who helped me out by giving right advice. Now i have healthy son  who is 4yr old.. Dr is know treating me for my second kid .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: they didnt make us meet the main doctor only..so other susbtitute on the doctor had consulted us for the same

tags: None
review:
The appointment was at 11:30am, I was able to neet the doctor only at 1:30pm.  What is the point of an appointment if one has to wait for over 2 hours.
So many patients came after me, but they were attended to before me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I couldn't meet Dr. Vidyamani Boraiah. So I was consulted by one her assistant. ** **** ******* ******** ***** ****** ****** * *** ******. She just gave medicines and explained how to take and told avoid junk foods. She don't have patience to explain what's happening to me. And no patience to listen about my health history also.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor is  not available at 10 but starts appointment from10.30.Please change the tine slot. also they appointment as per first come first serve basis. so you appointment are of no use.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
She is just an amazing doctor. I had visited so many other doctors but they couldn't really find me a solution.  Dr Vidyamani is just like a miracle. She has so much experience and she is so gentle and loving, makes u so comfortable.
Truly amazing doctor.

tags: None
review: Good response from the staff and doctor ... I had gone for IVF treatment and got good explanation about it...

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: ********* ** ** very responding really well the way they treat the patient is fantastic so always prefer this dr thank you

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Not satisfactory. They did not give me resolution. Doctor was so busy that she did not have time to attend me and sent a junior doctor to me

review: Amazing doctor. Really helped me during my pregnancy and even lost delivery. Highly recommended seeing her.
